an10.192:0.3: 192. The Teaching of the Good Persons
an10.192:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the good persons and the teaching of the bad persons.
an10.192:1.3: And what is the teaching of the bad persons?
an10.192:1.6: This is the teaching of the bad persons.
an10.192:2.1: And what is the teaching of the good persons?
an10.192:2.4: This is the teaching of the good persons.”
